page.title: 19INTERVIEWS (cont)
page.content: He says that these changes are for the the better. We then met the wife of show_jumper. She said that there was no public {transport}in the area and that no tourists visit the area.She said that there was no art or craft and that she hunts. Another farmer said that his {livestock}were just sheep, and cattle;his{crops}were wheat and barley.He had fourteen hundred acres of arable land.It became obvious that most people liked living in the area and they tended to indulge in outdoor {sports}like fishing and horse riding.
